Pre-Game Insights: Chris Hughton has made three changes to his starting lineup for the FIFA World Cup qualifier against Comoros, with Denis Odoi, Kasim Nuhu Adams, and Andre Ayew replacing Daniel Amartey, Alidu Seidu, and Mohammed Kudus.
The lineup includes Gideon Mensah, Denis Odoi, Nicholas Opoku, and Kasim Nuhu in the defense, with Richard Ofori continuing in goal.
Abdul Samed Salis and Baba Iddrisu will play in midfield, while Andre Ayew will operate as a false nine behind Antoine Semenyo, Jordan Ayew, and Inaki Williams.
